user_query: I'm a cryptocurrency trader and I'm looking for new exchanges to diversify my portfolio. Can you provide a list of exchanges along with their available symbols and incidents? Also, suggest some reference currencies I can use for trading.

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of cryptocurrency exchanges available for trading.
Retrieve available symbols (trading pairs) for each exchange obtained in step 1.
Query incidents (if any) related to the exchanges obtained in step 1.
Suggest reference currencies commonly used in cryptocurrency trading.
